question: After the Batlle of Chinsura (1759), who became the Nawab of Bengal?
explanation: On November 25,1759, the Battle of Chinsurah (also known as the Battle of Biderra) was fought between the British East India Company and the Dutch East India Company ((which had been invited by the Nawab of Bengal Mir Jafar). In it, the British forces defeated the Dutch army and overthrew the titular Nawab Mir Jafar and replaced him with his son-in-law Mir Qasim as Nawab of Bengal.
